## Welcome to my personal website!

I am a Master's student in Interactive Arts and Technology at Simon Fraser University with a background in Computer Science. My research interests include human-computer interaction, AI literacy, and educational technology. Currently, I work as a Research Assistant at the Tangible Embodied Child-Computer Interaction (TECI) Lab at SIAT, SFU, and as a Machine Learning Engineer at QCA Systems Ltd.
